sen.j: 楠木 正則（くすのき まさのり）は室町時代の武将。
sen.e: Masanori KUSUNOKI was a busho (Japanese military commander) in Muromachi period.
Masanori KUSUNOKI was a busho (Japanese military commander) in Muromachi period.
Masanori KUSUNOKI was a busho (Japanese military commander) in Muromachi period.
He was a son of Masanori KUSUNOKI.
He was a son of Masanori KUSUNOKI..
sen.cmt: ピリオドを追加しました。
sen.e: He was a son of Masanori KUSUNOKI..

sen.j: 河内国守護の畠山基国に仕えたとされ、以後正則の系統は代々畠山氏に仕えている。
sen.e: He is said to have served Motokuni HATAKEYAMA, who was a Shugo (a provincial military governor) of Kawachi Province and after Masanori, his descendants served Hatakeyama clan for generations.
He is said to have served Motokuni HATAKEYAMA, who was a Shugo (a provincial military governor) of Kawachi Province and after Masanori, his descendants served Hatakeyama clan for generations.
